text:
[Announcer]
Remove your blindfolds.

[Announcer]
You have four minutes.
To do what?

[Announcer]
The game begins now.

Welcome to the wildest,
most over-the-top competition show.
I am breaking you down to build you up.
I'm on the chopping block every night.
That was stupid as s***.
I would eat you like a bowl of cereal.
F*** you.
But in a shocking twist, the contestants are all actors except Ben.
We don't get fooled again.

We had to make this believable
so we don't blow this whole reality.
I ended up getting lost.
I almost think they, like, flipped the wall.
Dig through this pile of excrement.
Find the golden nugget.

This show is getting really
stupid and I love it.
Ben is an amazing guy.
I feel really bad. So sorry Ben.
Boy, do I hope we're all friends after this.

The Joe Schmo Show premieres 
January 21st on TBS.
